attributes.action: Make political parties responsible for the policies they make. If they say they are going to do something then they should do it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If a product is falsely advertised then the company is sued for false advertising. Before an election it is basically advertising which party voters should vote for based on the policies and what they say they are going to do. They should therefore do those things or otherwise be punished for it.
